title: Path of electron passing between two magnets

content.prompt: At the instant shown above, an electron is moving to the right along a straight line midway between two identical bar magnets. Which of the following describes the path of the electron as it continues to move?

choices.label: It remains on the straight line and passes completely between the magnets.
It curves upward and strikes the top magnet.
It curves downward and reverses direction before it enters the space between the magnets.
It stops and reverses direction, then moves to the left along the same straight line.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
